Description: - 3 Bedroom Apartment in Dorchester - Available for September 1st - Renovated Eat-In Kitchen - Hardwood Floors - Student Friendly - Pets Negotiable - Laundry Hookups in Kitchen or Laundromat 1 Minute Walk from Building - Parking Available on Street - Public Transportation: Bus Lines 8, 18, 41 - Red Line at JFK/UMass (5 min walk) - Close to UMass Boston
